mapper.select: select count(ID) from vod_phone_channel where 1=1
select case when max(channelCode) is not null then max(channelCode) + 1 else max(channelCode) + 1 end as count from vod_phone_channel where 1=1 and channelCode<1000000000

select
from vod_phone_channel where levels=1 order by id limit 1

select
from vod_phone_channel where levels=1 and channelCode = {channelCode};
mapper.insert: insert into vod_phone_channel ( channelName,channelCode,levels,sequence , parentCode, status, navigationtype,count, create_time,create_user,type ,isshow_left,isshow_right,isshow_img,img,labels,anotherName,labelType ) values ( #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levels,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{navigationtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},now(), #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isshow_left,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{isshow_right,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isshow_img,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{labels,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anotherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{labelType} )

insert into vod_phone_channel ( channelName,channelCode,levels,sequence , parentCode, status, navigationtype,count, create_time,create_user,type ,isshow_left,isshow_right,isshow_img,img,labels,anotherName ) values ( #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levels,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{navigationtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},now(), #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isshow_left,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{isshow_right,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isshow_img,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{labels,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{anotherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update vod_phone_channel
update_time=now(),
channelName = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
labels = #{labels,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
levels = #{levels,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parentCode = #{parentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
navigationtype = #{navigationtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user = #{update_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isshow_left = #{isshow_left,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isshow_right = #{isshow_right,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isshow_img = #{isshow_img,jdbcType=INTEGER},
anotherName = #{anotherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
labelType = #{labelType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update vod_phone_channel
update_time=now(),
channelName = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
labels = #{labels,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select sequence from vod_phone_channel_albuminfo a
and a.channelCode=#{channelCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and a.seriesCode in (${albumid})
order by a.sequence

select max(sequence) max, min(sequence) min from vod_phone_channel a
and a.id in (${id})

select sequence from vod_phone_channel a
and a.id in (${id})
order by a.sequence

select sequence from vod_labelchannel a
and a.id in (${id})
order by a.sequence
